medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe pain in the left hip, consistent with osteonecrosis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of osteonecrosis appeared after virologic suppression and improvement in CD4 lymphocyte counts due to antiretroviral therapy. Hip pain developed shortly after treatment began, with some patients experiencing bilateral hip pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV infection; one patient had a history of significant alcohol abuse and another had hyperlipidemia.
medical_history.social_history: One patient reported smoking one-half of a pack of cigarettes per day. Other patients had histories of alcohol and cocaine use.
